title: Mandrake the Magician. Vol. 02
creator_credit: Sam Nelson, Norman Deming and Columbia Pictures
brief_description: The comics’ crimefighting prestidigitator comes to the screen in this thrill-laden serial as Mandrake (Warren Hull) and his African sidekick Lothar (Al Kikume) help a noted scientist protect his radium-energy machine from a sinister criminal genius known as the Wasp. Doris Weston and Forbes Murray co-star.
